title: Perceived influences on consumer purchasing of eyewear in the U.S. 2012
summary: A survey conducted in 2012 reveals that the largest groups of Italian respondents cheated on U.S. Word_of_mouth either influences a Doctor_recommendation or influences a Optician/sales_rep_recommendation .
In Price , 27 % of interviewees in Italy stated that they betrayed U.S. Word_of_mouth influences a Doctor_recommendation , while 19 % did so influences a Optician/sales_rep_recommendation .
However , it was common to eyewear influences strangers as well .
